CustomField.description: Indicates that the object selected in the Object field on this metadata record should be included as a child to this object. If a value is set in this field, no value should be provided for the Account Identifier field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that the object selected in the Object field on this metadata record should be included as a child to this object. If a value is set in this field, no value should be provided for the Account Identifier field.
CustomField.label: Parent Object Name
